title: CommodityLocationIdentifierTypeEnum
description: Defines the enumerated values to specify the nature of a location identifier.

oneOf.title: BuyerHub
oneOf.description: The hub code of the buyer.

oneOf.title: DeliveryPoint
oneOf.description: The physical or virtual point at which the commodity will be delivered.

oneOf.title: DeliveryZone
oneOf.description: The zone covering potential delivery points for the commodity

oneOf.title: EntryPoint
oneOf.description: The physical or virtual point at which the commodity enters a transportation system.

oneOf.title: InterconnectionPoint
oneOf.description: Identification of the border(s) or border point(s) of a transportation contract.

oneOf.title: SellerHub
oneOf.description: The hub code of the seller.

oneOf.title: WithdrawalPoint
oneOf.description: The physical or virtual point at which the commodity is withdrawn from a transportation system.
